techmeme.title: Sources: Meituan considers raising $1B+ via a bond offering this year as the food delivery and shopping platform seeks to repay some debt and fund its expansion (Bloomberg)
EvolutionaryScale releases AI models called ESM3 to create novel proteins and raised $142M in seed funding led by Nat Friedman, Daniel Gross, and Lux Capital (Reuters)
In preliminary findings, the EU charges Microsoft with antitrust violations over concerns that it gave Teams an "undue advantage" by bundling it with Office (Javier Espinoza/Financial Times)
Chinese state media: OpenAI told Chinese developers that they will lose API access from July 9 as they are in a "region that OpenAI does not currently support" (Eduardo Baptista/Reuters)
A look at the privacy concerns surrounding apps targeting women's health; PitchBook: femtech startups raised almost $4.9B between March 2021 and March 2024 (Stephanie Stacey/Financial Times)
